text: Eric Johnson (born 16 December 1944) is an English former professional footballer who played as a left-half. He made appearances in the English Football League with Wrexham in the 1960s, along with playing in the Welsh league with Rhyl. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:English footballers Category:Association football wing halves Category:Everton F.C. players Category:Wrexham A.F.C. players Category:Rhyl F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Eric Johnson (footballer)
